latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Designated outdoor play area was observed without fencing of appropriate height at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection toxic substances observed improperly stored so as to result in the potential for exposure or contamination of facility surfaces

infractions.Violation Summary: Sufficient utility sinks not provided not of adequate size insufficent water provided in comercial buildings
At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish

violations.Violation Summary: Windows excluding fire escape windows in a child care service observed without window guards in a child care service
